acceptance-test-run.title: Even when memoization is true, if generics Pojos have different types, objects should not be equal
acceptance-test-run.name: evenWhenMemoizationIsTrueIfGenericPojosHaveDifferentTypesObjectsShouldNotBeEqual

test-step.description: When I invoke Podam for a Generic Pojo specifying the concrete types
Then the Object should not be null
When I invoke Podam for a Generic Pojo specifying the concrete types
Then the Object should not be null
Then the two objects should be different
